pytket.qiskit¶

Module for conversion between IBM Qiskit and \(\mathrm{t|ket}\rangle\) primitives.

class pytket.qiskit.TketPass(backend: qiskit.providers.basebackend.BaseBackend, DROP_CONDS: bool = False, BOX_UNKNOWN: bool = True, name: str = 'T|KET>')¶

The \(\mathrm{t|ket}\rangle\) compiler to be plugged in to the Qiskit compilation sequence

run(dag: qiskit.dagcircuit.dagcircuit.DAGCircuit) → qiskit.dagcircuit.dagcircuit.DAGCircuit¶
Run one pass of optimisation on the circuit and route for the given backend.
Return type:DAGCircuit
Parameters:dag (DAGCircuit) – The circuit to optimise and route
Returns:The modified circuit
pytket.qiskit.qiskit_to_tk(qcirc: qiskit.circuit.quantumcircuit.QuantumCircuit) → pytket._circuit.Circuit¶

Convert a qiskit.QuantumCircuit to a Circuit.

Parameters:qcirc (QuantumCircuit) – A circuit to be converted
Returns:The converted circuit
Return type:Circuit
pytket.qiskit.tk_to_qiskit(tkcirc: pytket._circuit.Circuit) → qiskit.circuit.quantumcircuit.QuantumCircuit¶

Convert back

Parameters:tkcirc (Circuit) – A circuit to be converted
Returns:The converted circuit
Return type:QuantumCircuit
